Series.Actors: |Kevin Spacey|Robin Wright|Michael Kelly|Dan Ziskie|Nathan Darrow|Ben Daniels|Sandrine Holt|Mahershala Ali|Boris McGiver|Michel Gill|Sebastian Arcelus|Constance Zimmer|Kristen Connolly|Sakina Jaffrey|Corey Stoll|Kate Mara|
Series.Overview: Ruthless and cunning, Congressman Francis Underwood and his wife Claire stop at nothing to conquer everything. This wicked political drama penetrates the shadowy world of greed, sex and corruption in modern D.C.
